text: How do I reset my password?

action.title: Password reset procedure
action.content:
Steps:
1. Go to https://example.com/reset
2. Enter registered email
3. Click verification link
4. Choose new password and confirm

action.title: Invoice download
action.content: Go to Account > Billing > Invoices and click Download on the desired month.

action.title: App crash on startup (Windows)
action.content: Common causes: corrupted cache, incompatible drivers. Try clearing cache: %APPDATA%/MyApp/cache and reinstalling.

resolution.message:
You can update your account details by going to:

Settings → Account → Profile → Edit

For email updates, you will receive a verification link on the new email address.
Clicking the verification link completes the update process.

Clicking the verification link completes the update process.

You can update your account details by going to:

Settings → Account → Profile → Edit

For email updates, you will receive a verification link on the new email address.
Clicking the verification link completes the update process.

Sure — here’s how to reset your password:

Steps: 1. Open the sign-in page. 2. Click 'Forgot Password'. 3. Enter your registered email address. 4. Open the email and click the verification link. 5. Choose and confirm a new password. Notes: Check spam folder if you don't see the email within 5 minutes.

I found this troubleshooting guide:

Steps: 1. Open the sign-in page. 2. Click 'Forgot Password'. 3. Enter your registered email address. 4. Open the email and click the verification link. 5. Choose and confirm a new password. Notes: Check spam folder if you don't see the email within 5 minutes.
